Headline: #53A Pulaski Temporary Southbound Reroute near Pulaski/59th Street
ShortDescription: Southbound 53A Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 59th, Kedzie and 63rd: due to, street blockage near Pulaski/59th Street.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #53A Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 59th, Kedzie and 63rd: due to, street blockage near Pulaski/59th Street.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
